xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils

Class MHistograms.RHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils.MHistograms.AbstractSelHistogram
      • xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils.MHistograms.RTreeBasicHistogram
        • xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils.MHistograms.RHistogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MHistogram
    Enclosing class:
    MHistograms

    public static class MHistograms.RHistogram
extends MHistograms.RTreeBasicHistogram
    Two step R-tree based histogram. In the first step R-tree leaf nodes are build using gopt strategy. In the second step histogram is constructed using opt strategy. In the basic variant a sum of volumes of bucket MBR are used for optimization. We refer for details to D. Achakeev and B. Seeger A class of R-tree histograms for spatial databases GIS 2012 p := number of buckets B = N/(p*avgLoad) b = B*minBound As histogram is build using opt partitioning strategy, in the second step dynamic programming table occupies quadratic space in the number of input leafs. Therefore, we use a simple heuristic. We partition the input set of leaf nodes in chunks of 20 000 pages according to the sorting order and apply opt partitioning on each.
